name: places/ChIJyZewnahZwokRMa97hulwd8Q
formattedAddress: 173 E 111th St, New York, NY 10029, USA
adrFormatAddress: 173 E 111th St, New York, NY 10029-2823, USA

originalText.text:
Overall, would not recommend to a friend. Not worth the time or money. There are similar if not better resources available for free through the library or online.

My husband & I took the group childbirth education class with Fledging Families as they were recommended by my doctor’s practice that is associated with Mt. Sinai. The class was held from 10:15am - 4:30pm on a Saturday and the agenda allowed for only a 20 minute break for attendees to grab something to eat for lunch. The majority of the class was traditional lecturer style with projected slides. The instructor spend approximately 30mins talking to each slide which looked like they were copied and pasted from a 1990’s textbook. Since I had read a few pregnancy books prior to taking the course, I did not find the information that particularly new or the style of presentation engaging at all. The last 30 minutes of class was left for hands on practice of baby care skills such as swaddling and burping which I was looking forward to but there were not enough practice dolls per couples so not everyone got the same opportunity to learn. Finally, the class concluded with a relaxation exercise. Overall, I was disappointed in the experience especially for the price of $400. I would not recommend this class to a friend. Instead I would tell them to rent a few books from the library and put the money towards something they need to buy for the baby or a prenatal massage.

originalText.text: We had an excellent class at fledgling with Helen. It was very instructive and she gave us lot of advises about labor , and for before and after birth so we felt very reassured and confident after her class. She could answer all our questions. Helen is very professional and has lot of experience. She knows a lot about babies. She was also very helpful after birth when our baby had problems for feeding , she spent time with us and she found a solution, she guides me and I’ll always be grateful for what she did. she’s really dedicated to her work. Thanks again Helen!
